titles: The abridgment of Christian divinitie so exactly and methodically compiled that it leads us as it were by the hand to the reading of the Holy Scriptures, ordering of common-places, understanding of controversies, clearing of some cases of conscience / by John Wollebius ; faithfully translated into English ... by Alexander Ross.
author: Wolleb, Johannes, 1586-1629.
publisher: Printed by T. Mabb for Joseph Nevill and are to be sold at his shop...,
notes: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
